name: Flappybalt (itch)
description:
Created by Adam Atomic, ported to HaxeFlixel by Steve Richey, now available for Android, iOS, and other stuff too.

Open source! Free! Just flap or don't.

Features:
- Flapping
- Spikes

Original version: http://adamatomic.com/flappybalt/
Source code: https://github.com/steverichey/Flappybalt
